pullrequest.title: Modify gazebo rendering to compile with Ogre 1.11/1.12

content.raw:
I do not think so: the `gazebo10` branch is  already able to compiled against Ogre 1.10 \(see [https://github.com/j-rivero/vcpkg\_ignition/issues/2#issuecomment-483406716](https://github.com/j-rivero/vcpkg_ignition/issues/2#issuecomment-483406716)\), and most of those changes removed the use of deprecated functions that are still present in Ogre 1.11 and 1.12. I am not sure removing deprecataion was necessary to compile against Ogre 1.10 in Gentoo, I wonder if something in the Gentoo port set the flag `-Werror` at some point.  
Anyhow, to avoid increasing even more the complexity of this PR, I explicitly avoided handling deprecation warnings in this PR, so the overlap with [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3052/wip-add-support-for-ogre-110](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3052/wip-add-support-for-ogre-110) is minimal.
